org.apache.juneau.internal

Class TeeWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • org.apache.juneau.internal.TeeWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class TeeWriter
extends Writer
    Writer that can send output to multiple writers.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public TeeWriter add(Writer w,
                     boolean close)
        Adds a writer to this tee writer.
        Parameters:
        w - The writer to add to this tee writer.
        close - If false, then calling close() on this tee writer will not filter to the specified writer.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • add

        public TeeWriter add(String id,
                     Writer w,
                     boolean close)
        Same as add(Writer, boolean) but associates the writer with an identifier so the writer can be retrieved through getWriter(String).
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to associate the writer with.
        w - The writer to add.
        close - Close the specified writer afterwards.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of inner writers in this tee writer.
        Returns:
        The number of writers.

      • getWriter

        public Writer getWriter(String id)
        Returns the writer identified through the id parameter passed in through the add(String, Writer, boolean) method.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID associated with the writer.
        Returns:
        The writer, or null if no identifier was specified when the writer was added.
